includefile.name: Api/ApiCfg.h
includefile.description: The following API files must be included.

includefile.name: Phoenix/Api/Types/ApiTypes.h
includefile.description: The following API files must be included.

mail.description: This mail is send from the PpApplication to enable No Emission mode. This command is intended for debugging/test purposes only.
This mail is send from the PpApplication to disable No Emission mode. This command is intended for debugging/test purposes only.
This mail is send from the PpApplication to leave No Emission State to be able to make calls.
Signals to the PpApplication that the protocol of the FP has entered count down state to No Emission State
Signals to the PpApplication that the protocol of the FP has entered No Emission State
Signals to the PpApplication that the protocol of the FP has left No Emission State
